sentences.english: The mountain range has much high peaks and deep canyons. The scenery is very lovely.

sentences.english: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I fear no evil.

sentences.english: It haunts the depths of the earth and the sea. It gleams from the hues of the shell and the precious stone.
sentences.chinese: 美，出没于深海幽谷，在奇石贝壳的色彩中闪烁。

sentences.english: Kadoorie Farm's valley stream, with its charming terraces and bridges.

sentences.english: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil, for Thou art with me.
sentences.chinese: 我虽行过死荫的幽谷也不怕遭害，因为你与我同在。

sentences.english: Lord, Your words will be my light Through death's cold and dreary night;

I am in the morning bush, of Stranglethorn's jungle, green and lush.

sentences.english: A little stream of Knowledge trickled slowly through a deep worn gully.

sentences.english: Maolin's Purple Butterfly Valley is where Taiwan's purple crow butterflies spend the winter.

sentences.english: I didn't fear that her fool of a husband would wander up the den so late.

sentences.english: That path has already led us through many valleys of the shadow of death.
